basic.description: This course covers mass and energy balances related to chemical process systems and measurements, as well as to the development of problem-solving methodologies in mass and energy balances.
basic.subject: ECH
basic.title: Mass and Energy Balances I

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: CHM 1046 and MAC 2312. Corequisites: CHM 2210, MAC 2313, and PHY 2048C.
